name: Get Binance Spot Market Financial Analysis via Telegram with GPT-4o

user.name: Don Jayamaha Jr
user.bio: With 12 years of experience as a Blockchain Strategist and Web3 Architect, I specialize in bridging the gap between traditional industries and decentralized technologies. My expertise spans tokenized assets, crypto payment integrations, and blockchain-driven market solutions.

description:
This workflow powers the **Binance Spot Market Quant AI Agent**, acting as the **Financial Market Analyst**. It fuses real-time market structure data (price, volume, kline) with multiple timeframe technical indicators (15m, 1h, 4h, 1d) and returns a structured trading outlook‚Äîperfect for intraday and swing traders who want actionable analysis in Telegram.

üîó **Requires the following sub-workflows** to function:
‚Ä¢ [Binance SM 15min Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4743-binance-sm-15min-indicators-tool/)
‚Ä¢ [Binance SM 1hour Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4744-binance-sm-1hour-indicators-tool/)
‚Ä¢ [Binance SM 4hour Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4745-binance-sm-4hour-indicators-tool/)
‚Ä¢ [Binance SM 1day Indicators Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4746-binance-sm-1day-indicators-tool/)
‚Ä¢ [Binance SM Price/24hStats/Kline Tool](https://n8n.io/workflows/4742-binance-sm-price-24hrstats-orderbook-kline-tool/)

## ‚öôÔ∏è How It Works

1. Triggered via webhook (typically by the Quant AI Agent).
2. Extracts user symbol + timeframe from input (e.g., "DOGE outlook today").
3. Calls all linked sub-workflows to retrieve indicators + live price data.
4. Merges the data and formats a clean trading report using GPT-4o-mini.
5. Returns HTML-formatted message suitable for Telegram delivery.

---

## üì• Sample Input

```json
{
  "message": "SOLUSDT",
  "sessionId": "654321123"
}
```

---

## ‚úÖ Telegram Output Format

```
üìä SOLUSDT Market Snapshot

üí∞ Price: $156.75  
üìâ 24h Stats: High $160.10 | Low $149.00 | Volume: 1.1M SOL

üß™ 4h Indicators:
‚Ä¢ RSI: 58.2 (Neutral-Bullish)  
‚Ä¢ MACD: Crossover Up  
‚Ä¢ BB: Squeezing Near Upper Band  
‚Ä¢ ADX: 25.7 (Rising Trend)

üìà Resistance: $163  
üìâ Support: $148
```

---

## üîç Use Cases

| Scenario                        | Outcome                                                   |
| ------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- |
| User asks for ‚ÄúBTC outlook‚Äù     | Returns 1h + 4h + 1d indicators + live price + key levels |
| Telegram bot prompt: ‚ÄúDOGE now‚Äù | Returns short-term 15m + 1h analysis snapshot             |
| Strategy trigger inside n8n     | Enables other workflows to consume structured signal data |

---

üé• **Watch Tutorial**:
[![Click to Watch](https://img.youtube.com/vi/HWHD-eXP0IE/hqdefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/HWHD-eXP0IE)

---

## üßæ Licensing & Attribution

Architecture, prompts, and trade report structure are IP-protected.
**No unauthorized rebranding or redistribution permitted.**

üîó For support: [LinkedIn ‚Äì Don Jayamaha](https://linkedin.com/in/donjayamahajr)

options.systemMessage:
You are the **Binance Spot Market Financial Analyst AI Agent**, tasked with interpreting natural-language trading queries and generating **multi-timeframe, indicator-driven market analysis** for any Binance spot symbol.

Your core responsibility is to orchestrate real-time price tools and technical indicator sub-agents to **diagnose trend conditions, volatility shifts, and market momentum**, and return a structured report formatted for Telegram.

---

### üîó Connected Tools & Agents

#### 1. **Price & Market Structure Tool**

Workflow: `Binance SM Price-24hrStats-OrderBook-Kline Tool`
Returns:

* `getCurrentPrice`
* `get24hrStats`
* `getOrderBook`
* `getKlines`
  Input:

```json
{
  "message": "<SYMBOL>",
  "sessionId": "<Telegram Chat ID>"
}
```

#### 2. **Timeframe-Based Technical Indicator Agents**

Each uses the latest Binance kline data (limit: 40) to calculate:

* **RSI** (14)
* **MACD** (12/26/9)
* **Bollinger Bands** (20/2)
* **SMA / EMA** (20)
* **ADX** (+DI, ‚àíDI, 14)

Agents:

* `Binance SM 15min Indicators Agent`
* `Binance SM 1hour Indicators Agent`
* `Binance SM 4hour Indicators Agent`
* `Binance SM 1day Indicators Agent`

Input to each agent:

```json
{
  "message": "<SYMBOL>",
  "sessionId": "<Telegram Chat ID>"
}
```

---

### üß† Decision Engine & Routing Logic

You must:

* Extract the **symbol** and **implied timeframe** from the user query.
* If no timeframe is given, default to:

  * **Short-Term**: 15m + 1h
  * **Mid-Term**: 1h + 4h
  * **Long-Term**: 1d + 4h
* Route data requests in parallel across tools
* Merge raw metrics into a final structured insight

---

### üì§ Telegram Output Template

Return your final result in this format:

```
üìä <SYMBOL> Market Snapshot

üí∞ Price: $63,220  
üìà 24h Change: +2.3%  
üìä Volume: 45,210 BTC

üß™ Technical Summary:
‚Ä¢ 1h RSI: 68 (Bullish)  
‚Ä¢ MACD: Crossover Up  
‚Ä¢ BB Width: Narrowing (Possible Breakout)  
‚Ä¢ ADX: 32 (Strong Trend)  

üìâ Support: $61,900  
üìà Resistance: $63,800
```

---

### ‚úÖ Input Handling Notes

* Input: Human questions like "How‚Äôs BTC doing today?" or "Is SOL bullish in the 4h chart?"
* If timeframe is missing, **infer intent**
* If symbol is missing, prompt: ‚ÄúWhich token would you like me to analyze?‚Äù
* All agents and tools **must return cleaned JSON**, avoid raw API output

parameters.description:
This tool is a delegated sub-agent workflow that provides low-level market data from the Binance Spot Market in response to upstream AI reasoning. It is used by higher-level agents (e.g. the Financial Analyst Agent) to retrieve structured financial metrics and price data for any cryptocurrency pair.

üîß What It Does:
This agent accepts a symbol-based message input and returns Binance API data for:

‚úÖ getCurrentPrice ‚Äì Latest market price for a trading pair (e.g., BTCUSDT)

‚úÖ get24hrStats ‚Äì 24-hour price change, high/low, volume, and close stats

‚úÖ getOrderBook ‚Äì Real-time order book (bids/asks) with adjustable depth

‚úÖ getKlines ‚Äì Candlestick OHLCV data for technical analysis

value.message: ={{ $fromAI("message","Populate this with a relevant message to this subagent")}}

workflowId.cachedResultName: Work Drive ‚Äî Binance SM 15min Indicators Tool

parameters.description:
This is a 15-minute interval technical indicator agent for Binance Spot Market pairs. It provides AI-driven access to real-time technical signals calculated on the latest 15-minute candlestick data. Designed for use within larger financial analysis workflows, this tool helps detect short-term momentum shifts and trading signals.

üîß What It Does:
When called with a valid crypto symbol, this agent fetches the latest 15-minute technical indicators, typically including (but not limited to):

‚úÖ Relative Strength Index (RSI)

‚úÖ Bollinger Bands (BBANDS)

‚úÖ Moving Averages (SMA/EMA)

‚úÖ MACD

‚úÖ ADX

value.message: ={{ $fromAI("message","Populate this with a relevant message to this subagent")}}

workflowId.cachedResultName: Work Drive ‚Äî Binance SM 1hour Indicators Tool

parameters.description:
This agent is responsible for analyzing 1-hour interval technical indicators for trading pairs on the Binance Spot Market. It is used to detect mid-range market momentum and potential entry/exit signals based on trend strength and volatility.

üîß What It Does:
When invoked, this agent queries the Binance SM 1hour Indicators Tool to retrieve AI-processed indicator data including (but not limited to):

‚úÖ RSI (Relative Strength Index)

‚úÖ MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence)

‚úÖ Bollinger Bands (BBANDS)

‚úÖ SMA / EMA (Simple & Exponential Moving Averages)

‚úÖ ADX (Average Directional Index)

These indicators are calculated from the latest 1-hour candlestick data and limited to the most recent data points (typically last 20).

value.message: ={{ $fromAI("message","Populate this with a relevant message to this subagent")}}

workflowId.cachedResultName: Work Drive ‚Äî Binance SM 4hour Indicators Tool

parameters.description:
This agent focuses on retrieving and analyzing 4-hour timeframe technical indicators for Binance Spot Market trading pairs. It provides a medium-term view of trend strength, volatility, and momentum shifts‚Äîideal for swing trading analysis and macro-level setups.

üîß What It Does:
When triggered, the agent queries the Binance SM 4hour Indicators Tool workflow and returns a curated set of technical indicator values, such as:

‚úÖ RSI (Relative Strength Index)

‚úÖ MACD (Moving Average Convergence Divergence)

‚úÖ Bollinger Bands

‚úÖ SMA / EMA

‚úÖ ADX (Trend Strength)

These indicators are derived from recent 4-hour candlestick data (typically the last 20 bars) and formatted for human-readable AI response generation.

parameters.content:
## Trigger: Parent Workflow Call
Node: When Executed by Another Workflow
This agent does not start on its own. It is always triggered from a higher-level agent, like:

**Binance Quant AI Agent**

Custom multi-timeframe analyzers

## Memory Context
Node: **Simple Memory
Stores the session ID, message, and interim indicator values** for cross-tool alignment. Enables:

Multi-turn dialogue logic

Trend comparison across timeframes

Report reuse if repeated query is made

## AI Engine
Node: OpenAI Chat Model
Model: **gpt-4.1-mini** or compatible
Used to:

Interpret values from all indicator tools

Label behavior: **‚ÄúOverbought,‚Äù ‚ÄúMACD Cross Up,‚Äù ‚ÄúVolatility Spike‚Äù**

Output final snapshot in clean Telegram format

## Price & Structure Tool
Node: **Binance SM Price-24hrStats-OrderBook-Kline Agent**
Returns raw metrics:

‚úÖ Current Price

‚úÖ 24hr Stats (OHLCV)

‚úÖ Order Book Depth (top 100 bids/asks)

‚úÖ Kline snapshots (15m, 1h, 4h, 1d)

All data is Telegram-optimized before AI formatting.

## Technical Indicator Agents
Each tool receives the same inputs:

json
{
  "message": "BTCUSDT",
  "sessionId": "539847013"
}

üî∏ **15m Indicator Agent**
Detects **fast-changing intraday signals** (scalping, fakeouts)


Each calculates:

RSI (14)

MACD (12/26/9)

BBANDS (20/2)

SMA/EMA (20)

ADX (+DI / ‚àíDI, 14)

## Technical Indicator Agents
Each tool receives the same inputs:

json
{
  "message": "BTCUSDT",
  "sessionId": "539847013"
}

üî∏ **1h Indicator Agent**
Best for **momentum confirmation or breakout acceleration**


Each calculates:

RSI (14)

MACD (12/26/9)

BBANDS (20/2)

SMA/EMA (20)

ADX (+DI / ‚àíDI, 14)

## Technical Indicator Agents
Each tool receives the same inputs:

json
{
  "message": "BTCUSDT",
  "sessionId": "539847013"
}

üî∏ **4h Indicator Agent**
**Macro view of medium-term setups and volume confirmation**

Each calculates:

RSI (14)

MACD (12/26/9)

BBANDS (20/2)

SMA/EMA (20)

ADX (+DI / ‚àíDI, 14)

## Technical Indicator Agents
Each tool receives the same inputs:

json
{
  "message": "BTCUSDT",
  "sessionId": "539847013"
}


üî∏ 1**d Indicator Agent**
**High-timeframe sentiment, ideal for swing trade direction**

Each calculates:

RSI (14)

MACD (12/26/9)

BBANDS (20/2)

SMA/EMA (20)

ADX (+DI / ‚àíDI, 14)

## Primary Reasoning Agent
Node: Binance SM Financial Analyst Agent
This is the orchestrator that:

**Parses the symbol** and optional timeframe from user input

Selects **tools dynamically**

**Merges all results into one final report**

# üìä Binance SM Financial Analyst Tool ‚Äì Documentation

A central orchestrator that fuses market structure data and technical indicators across all relevant timeframes, preparing them for final trading analysis inside the Quant AI system.

---

## üéØ Purpose

This tool is responsible for:

* Parsing Telegram-style prompts from the master agent
* Routing data requests to all relevant indicator tools (15m, 1h, 4h, 1d)
* Fetching price, volume, order book, and kline structure
* Merging all responses and returning a clean, readable summary

---

## üß© Connected Sub-Agents

| Sub-Agent Tool                           | Role                                                     |
| --------------------------------------   | -------------------------------------------------------- |
| ‚úÖ Binance SM 15min Indicators Tool       | Short-term volatility and reversals                      |
| ‚úÖ Binance SM 1hour Indicators Tool       | Intraday momentum and trend formation                    |
| ‚úÖ Binance SM 4hour Indicators Tool       | Swing trend analysis and confirmation                    |
| ‚úÖ Binance SM 1day Indicators Tool        | Macro trend detection and directional bias               |
| ‚úÖ Binance SM Price/24hStats/Kline Tool   | Raw market structure: OHLCV, order book, real-time price |

---

## ‚öôÔ∏è Workflow Architecture

| Section                             | Description                                                     |
| ----------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- |
| üîÑ **Trigger:**                     | Executed by Quant AI Agent or Telegram Bot Handler              |
| üí¨ **LLM Reasoning (gpt-4o-mini):** | Interprets queries, symbol, timeframe, intent                   |
| üß† **Session Memory:**              | Tracks `sessionId`, symbol history, multi-turn intent           |
| üì• **Input Format:**                | `{ \"message\": \"SOLUSDT\", \"sessionId\": \"123456789\" }`    |
| üîÅ **Tool Calls:**                  | Invokes all indicators and market data tools in parallel        |
| üìä **Merge Results:**               | Combines indicators + price + order book into structured output |
| üì§ **Final Output:**                | Telegram-ready HTML summary (text only, no raw JSON)            |

---

## üìè Timeframe Logic

| Case           | Action                                            |
| -------------- | ------------------------------------------------- |
| No timeframe   | Default to `15m + 1h` (short-term snapshot)       |
| Broad question | Return `1h + 4h + 1d` data (medium- to long-term) |
| Symbol missing | Ask user to clarify the token or asset symbol     |

---

## üñ•Ô∏è Telegram Output Format

```
üìä ETHUSDT Market Overview

üí∞ Price: $3,680  
üìâ 24h Stats: High $3,720 | Low $3,580 | Volume: 920,000 ETH

üß™ 4h Technical Indicators:
‚Ä¢ RSI: 62.1 ‚Üí Neutral-Bullish  
‚Ä¢ MACD: Crossover Up  
‚Ä¢ BB: Price near upper band  
‚Ä¢ ADX: 27.9 ‚Üí Growing Trend

üìà Resistance: $3,740  
üìâ Support: $3,600
```

---

## ‚úÖ Use Case Scenarios

| Scenario                               | Result                                                     |
| -------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| User asks: ‚ÄúShow me BTC outlook today‚Äù | 15m + 1h + 1d analysis merged and summarized               |
| User asks: ‚ÄúHow is DOGE trending?‚Äù     | Indicator agent fetch + live price + structure returned    |
| Input lacks timeframe                  | Defaults to short + medium scopes with follow-up if needed |

---
